pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Automated Way to Estimate EC50 for Stratified Datasets // An implementation for estimating Effective control to 50% of growth inhibition (EC50) for multi isolates and stratified datasets. It implements functions from the drc package in a way that is displayed a tidy data.frame as output. Info about the drc package is available in Ritz C, Baty F, Streibig JC, Gerhard D (2015) doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0146021.
